name: Shark Castle
description:
Shark Castle is an adventure game in which you play as Finlay, a sentient shark whose castle is overrun with pollution. To save your home, sneak past enemies and complete quests for your neighbours. You are able to travel through pipes to avoid enemies, but many are blocked with pollution.

Find and use limited resources to neutralize pollution, and avoid the watchful eyes of Damian and his robot minions. Help your friends with their gardening and sculpture projects to earn valuable items, and rescue Elmsworth, your goldfish friend who has gone missing...
